full_text:
Case 1:20-cv-00330-PAE Document 161 Filed 02/24/22 Page 26 of 130 A-5711

C2GFDAU1 Brune - direct 254
1 Q. And she communicated to you about the issues that came up during jury selection?
2 A. She did.
3 Q. Now, Ms. Edelstein was also a partner who was part of the
4 team of this case, correct?
5 A. Yes.
6 Q. She's in San Francisco, is that right? Or, well,
7 theoretically she lived in San Francisco?
8 A. She moved to New York for the trial, but in general she
9 works in the San Francisco office.
10 Q. And you assembled a large team to assist you on this case,
11 correct?
12 A. We did.
13 Q. That would include Adam Hollander?
14 A. That's right.
15 Q. At that time he was an associate in your New York office?
16 A. Yes.
17 Q. And Randy Kim I think you referenced a partner in San
18 Francisco?
19 A. Yes.
20 Q. And Vivienne Stapp?
21 A. Yes, Vivienne Stapp.
22 Q. She's an associate in the San Francisco office?
23 A. That's correct.
24 Q. And Kendra Melrose?
25
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300

DOJ-OGR-00009315
